name: 1private bedroom close to all Boston attractions#4
neighborhood_overview: It’s easy accessible by train, bus, Uber, foot.
description:
This is a beautiful comfortable 4bed townhouse in Boston, South End. You will have your 1 private bedroom with a lock and can share the kitchen, patio, 1 1/2 bathrooms with other guests. There is a queen bed with a twin bed underneath, a good size closet, and a desk you can use with your laptop. Everything is professionally clean after the guests leave. We take pride in cleaning thoroughly all the linens provided and the common shared areas. Tourist info brochures/maps available in the room.

The space
This place is a 10minutes Uber ride to Fenway, Copley Place, Downtown Boston. It is also accessible by transportation, train and buses or by foot. For example it can take up to 20minutes by foot to go to Copley Place.

Guest access
Guests can also share and use the patio for entertaining or grilling anytime.

Other things to note
It’s a quite and safe neighborhood.

name: 1private bedroom/1single bed in South End Boston#3
neighborhood_overview: It’s quite and safe; easy accessible by transportation, Uber, foot.
description:
This is a modern chic 4 bedroom townhouse in Boston, South End. You will have your 1 private beautiful bedroom with a lock and can share the kitchen, living room, washer/dryer, patio, 1 1/2 bathrooms with other guests. This is a small bedroom, can accommodate 1guest. There is a single bed, a closet and a desk. Everything is professionally clean after the guest leaves. We take pride in cleaning thoroughly all the linens provided and the common shared areas.

The space
This place is 15 minutes Uber ride to Fenway, Copley Place, Downtown Boston. Northeastern University is 5 minutes walk. It is also accessible by transportation, train, and buses or by foot. For example it can take up to 25 minutes by foot to go to Copley Place.

Guest access
Guests will share kitchen, living room, washer/dryer, patio for entertainment or grilling.

Other things to note
Please respect other guests privacy.

name: 1 private bedroom with 2 twin beds Boston#2
neighborhood_overview: Boston is one of the most expensive cities!I love living in this neighborhood because it’s easily accessible to all Boston has to offer without breaking the budget.
description:
This is a beautiful 4 bedroom modern house in Boston’s desirable South End neighborhood. You will have a private bedroom with a lock and will share the kitchen, living room, patio, 1 1/2 bathrooms with other guests. This comfortable bedroom can accommodate 2 guests. There are 2 twin beds with sparkling clean linens, pillows, sheets, duvet covers. There are 2 desks with chairs for each guest so you can comfortably work on your laptop. Everything is professionally cleaned before the guests arrive.

The space
This place is 5 minutes walk to Northeastern University, 15 minutes walk to BU Medical, easily accessible to Longwood area, 30 minutes walk to Brigham & Women Hospital,10 minutes Uber ride to Fenway, Museum of Fine Arts, Copley Place. It is accessible by transportation, train, buses or by foot. You can walk to Prudential or Copley Square (25 minutes walk).

Guest access
Guests share all common areas kitchen, living room, bathrooms or patio
